trans-unit.source: Iterates over all following nodes according to the XPath following-axis rules.
trans-unit.target: Itera em todos os nós a seguir acordo com as regras de eixo seguinte XPath.

trans-unit.source: According to the XPath following-axis rules, the descendants are not included, even though they follow the starting node in document order.
trans-unit.target: Acordo com as regras de eixo seguinte XPath, os descendentes não são incluídos, mesmo que elas adotam o nó inicial na ordem do documento.
Retorna o navegador de resultados atual.

trans-unit.source: The state of the navigator changes only if the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.XPathFollowingIterator.MoveNext%2A> method has returned `true`.
trans-unit.target: O estado do se navegador alterações somente o <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.XPathFollowingIterator.MoveNext%2A>método retornou `true`.</xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.XPathFollowingIterator.MoveNext%2A>

trans-unit.source: Positions the iterator to the next following node.
trans-unit.target: Posiciona o iterador até o próximo nó.

trans-unit.source: If the iterator was set to the next following node, the MoveNext method sets the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.XPathFollowingIterator.Current%2A> property to the current result navigator; otherwise, the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.XPathFollowingIterator.Current%2A> property remains unchanged.
trans-unit.target: Se o iterador foi definido para o próximo nó seguinte, o método MoveNext define o <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.XPathFollowingIterator.Current%2A>propriedade para o navegador de resultados atual; caso contrário, o <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.XPathFollowingIterator.Current%2A>propriedade permanece inalterada.</xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.XPathFollowingIterator.Current%2A> </xref:System.Xml.Xsl.Runtime.XPathFollowingIterator.Current%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the iterator was set to the next following node; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o iterador foi definido para o próximo nó; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
